By
Paul Lilly
18 March 2020
Score a 'B stock' EVGA GeForce RTX 2080 Ti for as low as $910.I'm still waiting on Nvidia to reveal its next-generation Ampere GPU, but if you're wanting to go all-out on a top-end graphics card today, the GeForce RTX 2080 Ti is the go-to option. As it relates to that, EVGA is selling b-stock models for up to $290 off right now.First of all, what is B-stock? They're basically recertified parts."B-stock products are units which may have small scratches, small dents, or noticeable use. B-stock products are factory recertified to meet the performance and reliability of a new product of the same model. B-stock products do not come with any optional accessories and only include the accessories required to use the product," Nvidia explains.EVGA GeForce RTX 2080 Ti Black Edition Gaming | Recertified | $909.99 (save $90)
This is about as cheap as it gets for a GeForce RTX 2080 Ti. It's incredibly fast, supports real-time ray tracing, and comes backed by a 1-year warranty.
View DealNormally I shy away from refurbished deals, but am making an exception here for two reasons. One, these are the lowest prices around on the best graphics card for gaming. And secondly, EVGA is the one recertifying these, not a third-party. All of the ones on sale also come with a one-year warranty.There are several models marked down right now. The one pictured up top is the GeForce RTX 2080 Ti Black Edition Gaming, which sticks to stock clocks. On the extreme end of the spectrum, EVGA is selling a B-stock version of its GeForce RTX 2080 Ti XC Hybrid Gaming, which pairs an all-in-one liquid cooler with a traditional air cooling shroud. That one is available for $1,009, which is $290 below its list price.Head over the EVGA's b-stock page to view all of the models available.Paul has been playing PC games and raking his knuckles on computer hardware since the Commodore 64. He does not have any tattoos, but thinks it would be cool to get one that reads LOAD"*",8,1. In his off time, he rides motorcycles and wrestles alligators (only one of those is true).Sign up to get the best content of the week, and great gaming deals, as picked by the editors.PC Gamer is part of Future US Inc, an international media group and leading digital publisher. https://elchapuzasinformatico.com/2020/0: Tras la EVGA GeForce RTX 2060 KO, que se hizo rápidamente popular al ser la RTX 2060 más barata del mercado, y emplear el silicio de 'mal capado' de la GeForce RTX 2080, que en tareas profesionales aportaban hasta un 47% más de rendimiento, ahora llegan las EVGA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER KO y EVGA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER KO para repetir el mismo movimiento, es decir, desestabilizar el mercado bajando los precios.La EVGA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER KO Gaming (08G-P4-2083-KR) mantiene el uso del silicio Nvidia Turing TU104-450-A1 con 3072 CUDA Cores, 192 TMUs, 64 ROPs, 384 Tensor Core y 48 RT Cores a una frecuencia Turbo de 1815 MHz mientras que sus 8 GB de memoria GDDR5 vienen a 15.5 GHz, es decir, mismas velocidades que la Founders Edition. Realmente no parece existir ningún cambio físico con la RTX SUPER 2080, por lo que todo se centrará en bajar los precios actuales.Con la EVGA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER KO (08G-P4-2072-KR) sucede lo mismo, a nivel de especificaciones no hay sorpresas, manteniendo así el silicio TU104-410-A1 con 2560 CUDA Cores, 184 TMUs, 64 ROPs, 320 Tensor Cores y 40 RT Cores a una frecuencia Turbo de 1770 MHz con 8 GB de memoria GDDR6 @ 14 GHz.A diferencia de la EVGA GeForce RTX 2060 KO, aquí no tendremos un cambio en el hardware, pero estos modelos buscarán ser los más económicos del mercado en un momento clave donde las Radeon RX 5700 XT están remontando en ventas y ya hay rumores de que a finales de agosto se presentará la nueva generación de GPUs, por lo que toca ir limpiando el stock. Si sucede lo mismo que con la RTX 2060 KO, esto forzará al resto de fabricantes a disminuir los precios.
https://benchlife.info/evga-geforce-rtx-: 面對著 Radeon RX 5600 XT，EVGA 端出一張較特殊的 RTX 2060 來應戰。 CES 2020 展期間，作為 NVIDIA 相當友好的合作夥伴之一 EVGA 端出了一張顯示卡 – GeForce RTX 2060 KO。其實，這不是 EVGA 端出 KO 系列產品，如果還有印象的話，EVGA 在 GeForce 8800 系列（G80）時期就端出過 e-GeForce 8800GTS KO ACS3 顯示卡。 「knocking out any challenger」是 EVGA KO 系列顯示卡的含義，這一次的 GeForce RTX 2060 KO 很明顯地是針對 AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT 而來。EVGA GeForce RTX 2060 KO 除了電晶體數量提升外，其他如 Shader Units、ROPs、Core Clock、Boost Clock 以及 Memory Clock，原則上都跟 NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Founder Edition 沒有太大不同。EVGA GeForce RTX 2060 KO 在散熱器部分與目前的 GeForce RTX 2060 XC、SC 與 Gaming 系列有所不同，它所使用的散熱器是 GeForce GTX 1660 Ti SC 的雙風扇散熱器。供電部分仍維持單 PCIe 8 Pin 設計，讓顯示卡最大能夠獲取 225W 供電需求。訊號輸出端子部分提供 DVI、HDMI 與 DisplayPort，這部份與 GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 和 GeForce RTX 2060 XC Black Gaming 相同。測試部分我們直接與 TU106 的 NVDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Founder Edition 比較。3DMark 部分，DirectX 12 的 Time Spy 系列沒有太大差異，但 DirectX 11 的 Fire Strike 系列就看得出 2 者的差異。跟著是 1920 x 1080 解析度的遊戲測試。最後則是 2560 x 1440 解析度下的遊戲測試數據。EVGA 的 GeForce RTX 2060 KO 迎戰 AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT 是一個很有趣的作法，但沒人想到 NVIDIA 竟然會在 Radeon RX 5600 XT 正式登場前將 TU106 的 GeForce RTX 2060 價格往下調整至 299 美元，這間接讓同樣是 299 美元的 GeForce RTX 2060 KO 處在一個尷尬的角色。然而就數據來看，同樣價位的 EVGA GeForce RTX 2060 KO 在表現上稍微要較 TU106 的 GeForce RTX 2060 略強一些，因此它仍有一定的市場定位在。同時，以 EVGA 目前 GeForce RTX 2060 系列顯示卡的台灣定價來看，EVGA GeForce RTX 2060 KO 以其效能來做基準的話，價格上似乎較具有優勢，特別是之前以低於新台幣 9,000 元的價格進行預購。；目前 EVGA GeForce RTX 2060 KO Gaming（06G-P4-2066-KR）建議售價為新台幣 9,490 元，而核心時脈較高的 EVGA GeForce RTX 2060 KO Ultra Gaming（06G-P4-2068-KR）則是新台幣 10,090 元。散熱並沒有太大問題，但功耗可能要比一般 TU106 的 GeForce RTX 2060 要高一些，但目前部分 AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT 的 TGP 也來到 180W，基本上沒有太大不同。 VR-Zone 中文站前網站總監，在科技 3C 打滾一些年... 但這些都是過去Comments are closed.半導體到各種終端裝置，測試（Bench）與考驗一直在我們人生（Life）來來回回，網站名稱起源就是如此而來。聯絡我們：[email protected] Copyright © 2020 — BenchLife. https://www.anandtech.com/show/15579/evg: EVGA this week has introduced a new family of entry-level, 80Plus power supplies. Promise to bring together strong performance, a rich feature set, and a relatively low price, EVGA’s modular B5-series PSUs are designed to tick all of the boxes expected for a basic PSU in 2020.The EVGA B5-series PSU family includes 550 W, 650 W, 750 W, and 850 W models, and are compliant with the latest ATX12 v2.52/EPS12V specifications. Fully modular, the most powerful SKU has six 8-pin PCIe power connectors, the 750 W model features four 8-pin PCIe power plugs, the 650 W flavor has three, whereas the entry 550 W model has two 8-pin PCIe power connectors. Obviously, the PSUs have SATA as well as Molex plugs too. The new power supplies correspond to the 80Plus Bronze requirements, so they are they are mandated to be 81% - 88% efficient under a 20% or 50% load as well as 81% - 85% efficient under a 100% load.EVGA’s latest B5-series PSUs use 100% Japanese capacitors on 750 W and 850 W models (and some on less powerful SKUs), and feature an no-fan/ECO mode that shuts down the 135-mm fluid-dynamic bearing fan under low and medium loads. In addition, the power supplies feature a comprehensive set of protection technologies that includes OVP (Over Voltage Protection), UVP (Under Voltage Protection), OCP (Over Current Protection), OPP (Over Power Protection), SCP (Short Circuit Protection), and OTP (Over Temperature Protection).EVGA’s B5-series power supplies measure 150x50x86 mm, which is pretty typical for mid-capacity PSUs, so they should easily fit into virtually any standard ATX case. And as mentioned earlier, the PSUs are fully modular, so they provide additional flexibility to system builders.EVGA’s B5-series PSUs are immediately available directly from the company. The cheapest model, the 550 W version, is priced at $79.99, whereas the most powerful 850 W SKU is priced at $129.99. The power supplies are covered by a five-year warranty, which is typical for inexpensive PSUs.Related Reading:Source: EVGA

EVGA RTX2080 FTW3显卡+Precision X1驱动测试


行逸行风


2020-03-08 14:53
这块NV亲儿子EVGA的GeForce RTX 2080 FTW3 GAMING入手的时候是为了新的双平台单机箱主机，当时朋友看着好也跟着入手一块，同时取回，所以有两块显卡的合照~用了一阵子之后觉得这块卡非常不错，用料足且温度低，而且驱动给力，所以来分享一波。包装硕大，而且这块EVGA GeForce RTX 2080 FTW3 GAMING显卡用料也很足，包装正面的GeForce RTX相当抢眼。​背面则是参数图啦外壳采用了透明设计，依稀能看到下面覆盖着致密的散热片，堆料的好处是以至于拿在手里有一种拿着东北巷战大杀器——板砖的感觉，玩笑玩笑，好处是后面的功耗压力测试中这块显卡温度最高也就56℃（室温21℃）~EVGA GeForce RTX 2080 FTW3 GAMING采用了双8pin供电，这个角度看上去颇为厚实，最右侧的斜角上有FTW3有版本提示条，比较有趣的是在NV-Link上的保护条上也有EVGA的LOGO，恩恩，作为背景有点虚了。接口有3*DP、1*HDMI、1*Type-C接口显卡背面是镂空的金属背板，表面不是细磨砂处理，手感上是一种厚实的糙，哈哈。显卡侧面​另一侧再来一张PCIe保护条保护着金手指，上面还有EVGA的LOGO。EVGA的LOGO在整个风扇的扇叶上也处处可见~侧面有12V G、R、B RGB LED针脚接口和AUX Fan接口。注意双8Pin供电旁边的背板上有“Normal”和“OC”两个标示，双BIOS根据需求选择即可。EVGA专有的驱动是Precision X1，集合了显卡超频、监控、帧数显示等等功能，超频非常简单，直接有自动超频测试，下面就来详细说说这个Precision X1。Precision X1的显卡概览界面看起来非常简单和直观，上半部分是显存频率、GPU频率和电压以及温度、功耗设定，最上一行还有显卡1、LED、HWM三个功能切换按钮；下半部分看起来是各个风扇的转数，其实并不简单，注意右下的ICX按钮，点击之后会出现下图的各个部位的温度；最右侧是一列快捷按钮，0-9都是自定义设置。EVGA的传感器遍布显卡的各处主要发热大户，点击ICX按钮之后就会全部显示，可以作为超频的参考数值。下半部分除了温度传感器之外还有频率和温度的关联调节、风扇和温度关联调节、UI后是最重要的电压和频率的自动扫描超频功能。 LED功能自不必说，默认的效果走起，原教旨来一把HWM界面是整个硬件的监控，默认以曲线图的形式监控GPU温度、频率、显存频率和使用率，还有当前刷新率FPS，不过点击上面的数字按钮后会有新世界召唤。HWM的监控功能细节选项图，可以说是很全了，随意选择。设置界面，我安装的时候默认不是开机启动……我是设定超频之后就开了自启动。还有一个选项是开启帧率监测，在游戏的时候左上角会出现GPU使用情况和帧数，不过这个选项的截图我忘了放哪了。想要自动超频直接在电压-频率曲线设定跑扫描看看体质，根据测试结果设定超频之后再来一次测试就稳了，不过时间很长，我记得吃了碗面条都没扫描完，毕竟是超频测试，慢点能稳也不是啥要紧的。把鼠标指针放在显存、GPU和功耗设定上停着，会弹出提示，这点对新手很友好，然后再决定超频幅度，不过自动超频已经很好用了，我没记错的话自动超频扫描之后设定的是2050，我也就再加到2100就停手了。当然电压-频率曲线也可以进行微调，但是建议要有一定技术基础，而且默认的自动超频很好用的，手不稳的自动就好。EVGA GeForce RTX 2080 FTW3 GAMING的驱动小超到2100后再跑一次，娱乐大师的显卡得分直接提高了24665分，增长了7.77%。下面是未超频时候的3DMARK得分动图。未超频时候的3DMARK得分动图未超频时候的3DMARK  Nvdia DLSS为43.36FPS。3DMARK Time Spy测试，显卡得分11843。3DMARK Time Spy测试，显卡得分11843。3DMARK Time Spy测试，显卡得分11843。3DMARK Time Spy Extreme测试，显卡得分5431。3DMARK  Fire Strike测试，显卡得分28290。3DMARK  Fire Strike Extreme测试，显卡得分13694。3DMARK  Fire Strike Ultra测试，显卡得分6774。光追Port Royal也跑了一下，显卡得分6937。NVIDIA的DLSS再跑了一下，46.80FPS。总结列表如上，拉到2100之后超频下起码得分提升7%。室温21℃，当时在朋友的3600X默频下压力测试了一把，2080显卡拉到2100，CPU和GPU满载的温度表现如上，CPU最高也就71℃，而显卡的最高温度也就56℃，后面的游戏特效全开长的时候温度也就不到65℃，EVGA的用料实在有体现了。感谢暴雪来了这么一把怀旧服务，也算是找回来一点当年大学时代的感觉，不过之前排队排的太凶了，而且年底岁初太忙，现在才49级，扯远了扯远了。2080 FTW3显卡搭配CRG9显示器在5120×1440分辨率下魔兽世界怀旧服基本在100多帧，人多了团战也在70帧以上，很是流畅，喜欢沉浸感的还是得上超宽屏啊。不过今年三星有个G9显示器要上，曲率更高，我在克制，嗯，克制。在书房升级了XG438Q显示器之后我在游戏室就不怎么玩吃鸡了，32:9的超宽屏玩吃鸡虽然沉浸度高，但是有一个问题那就是裁切画面，所以ROG XG438Q入手后我基本就在书房吃鸡来着。2080 FTW3显卡搭配CRG9显示器在5120×1440分辨率下，各项显示效果调到最高，帧数在55-77浮动，有点想升级2080Ti了~众生平等奥德赛，特效最高，平均帧数61，不过有一点比较奇特，那就是分辨率虽然是2560×1440但是选择无边框之后可以实现5120×1440全屏显示而不是屏幕拉伸，不过需要注意的是不能外接第二块屏幕，不然会失效，这个等我分享SONY HT-Z9F音箱的时候再细说。古墓丽影：暗影，2080 FTW3显卡搭配CRG9显示器在5120×1440分辨率下，SMAAT2×，效果最高，平均帧率50，可玩。巫师3，2080 FTW3显卡搭配CRG9显示器在5120×1440分辨率下，全屏效果极高，帧数持续保持55以上，效果全开美如画不成问题。需要注意的依旧是不能外接第二块屏幕，不然会失效，这个等我分享SONY HT-Z9F音箱的时候再细说。文末上两张装机完成的图，EVGA显卡的原色RGB效果。EVGA的GeForce RTX 2080 FTW3 GAMING这块显卡除了我自己的双平台主机之外给朋友也装过一片，朋友那个还好说，她用的27寸TUF Gaming VG27BQ电竞显示器，玩的不亦乐乎，我这块小超之后搭配CRG9显示器在5120×1440分辨率下基本上能保证大部分游戏特效最高能够流畅运行，毕竟是超宽屏32:9的，相当于两块27寸正常显示器连屏了，有点考验显卡（我有打算一步到位弄个2080Ti，还搞FTW3的，毕竟新卡短时间看还上不了，早买早享受~）。2080 FTW3 GAMING整体来说静音效果和温度都控制的很好，尤其是Precision X1驱动下的自动超频省心省力，可以说是非常令人满意的一块显卡。一直申请不到试用资格？投稿优质的原创内容会增加试用机会哦~Razer×宝可梦！刺鳞树蝰皮卡丘限定版无线鼠标HiFiMAN TWS600A：跨界真无线TWS蓝牙耳机AMD,YES！3600X+乔思伯TR-03“三角”机箱装机睿米无线吸尘器NEX 2 机甲大师编程挑战卡套装淘汰的手机你会留着吗？友情链接

https://www.tomshardware.com/news/EVGA-7:
By
Jeremy Laird
18 March 2020
Gold rated, a 10-year warranty and plenty of power. Power supply pricing has been pretty painful lately. But one of the best tech deals we found in this space makes a powerful PSU surprisingly accessible at just $80 on Newegg after entering the promo code "MBCKHUZ" and mailing in the $20 rebate. This matches the lowest price we've ever seen for the EVGA SuperNOVA 750 GA, and considering it's normally $129.99, that's a steal.Highlights include 80 Plus Gold certification ensuring decent power efficiency and a 750W power rating. The latter means you're good to go with even the most demanding CPU and GPU combos with some headroom left over.EVGA SuperNOVA 750 GA PSU: was $129.99, now $80 at Newegg
750W of power. Solid 80 Plus Gold efficiency certification. Fully modular design. 10-year warranty. That's a very nice overall package, and at $90 this power supply is as cheap as it's ever been. Don't forget to enter promo code "MBCKHUZ" and use the $20 rebate to get this price. View DealNext up? It's a fully modular PSU, so you can keep on top of cable management by only connecting the power rails you actually need. For the record, the EVGA SuperNOVA 750 GA includes both 8-pin and 4-pin supplementary CPU power rails.It looks to compete with the best power supplies with other features, like an eco mode that delivers totally silent operation up to 40% maximum power load and the use of fully 100% Japanese capacitors. Last but far from least, EVGA backs the SuperNOVA 750 GA with a beefy 10-year warranty. This should be a solid choice for a new PC build or for upgrading an aging or inadequate PSU if you're slotting in more power-hungry components. The modularity is a particular boon if you like neat and tidy internals.Get instant access to breaking news, in-depth reviews and helpful tips.Tom's Hardware is part of Future US Inc, an international media group and leading digital publisher. https://www.pgrepublic.com/evga-is-selli: EVGA just uploaded their b-class Nvidia GeForce RTX 2080 Ti cards. These cards are extremely cheap, however, they do not come in new condition or with any accessories. EVGA looks forward to next-generation Ampere GPU’s, and they want to get rid of these leftover cards.Let’s take a look at B-Stock Graphics Cards “B-stock products are units which may have small scratches, small dents,  or noticeable use. B-stock products are factory recertified to meet the  performance and reliability of a new product of the same model. B-stock  products do not come with any optional accessories and only include the  accessories required to use the product,” Nvidia explains. The EVGA GeForce RTX 2080 Ti cards can go up to $1000, however, these b-stock cards are $290 off. Additionally, all of the b-stock cards come with 1-year EVGA official warranty. 1-Year warranty also means that these cards are not refurbished. Some models also have a purchase limit, so you cannot buy them in bulk, mostly because EVGA might have limited stock.Since EVGA guaranties they work like charm, I think anyone with small budget should go for it. There are some pretty exciting deals on the front page, like RTX 2080 Black Edition Gaming for just $629. Similarly, EVGA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti SC2 Hybrid Gaming is available for $629. These cards easily average at more than $200 off. Head over to their official list, and grab your favorite card.Call of Duty: Warzone has 15 million players in 3 daysCS:GO sets a new record of 1 million concurrent players.Overwatch League Matches rescheduled after Coronavirus delayBungie allows all employees to work from home due to COVID-19 Source
